channel.title: My first model
channel.description:
Ok, I followed a few tuts and I got this, but be warned: it's terrible.
[IMG]http://i209.photobucket.com/albums/bb269/frogboy336/modelinmeta.png[/img] [IMG]http://i209.photobucket.com/albums/bb269/frogboy336/modelinrsmv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i209.photobucket.com/albums/bb269/frogboy336/wearinvmodels.png[/img]
Took me like an hour to do all that. Please give and honest review on it, but remember I made it from SCRATCH And it's my first model :p
If there's any chance you'd wanna add this(doubt it), get the models [url=http://www.MegaShare.com/545775]here.[/url]
and add this in class8: [code] if(i == itemid { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14567; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14568;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 14568;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Thing";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Kaelen made this :D".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]

item.title: My first model
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

Ok, I followed a few tuts and I got this, but be warned: it’s terrible.

modelinmeta.png737×491

modelinrsmv.png867×638

wearinvmodels.png764×505

Took me like an hour to do all that. Please give and honest review on it, but remember I made it from SCRATCH
And it’s my first model

If there’s any chance you’d wanna add this(doubt it), get the models here.

and add this in class8:

if(i == itemid { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14567; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14568;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 14568;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Thing";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Kaelen made this :D".getBytes();//examin info }

Read full topic
